title: Elden Ring dataminer uncovers alternate early game characters in a renamed Limgrave

description: Steamer Rob2628 took his Barbarian straight to the top.

title: The demo for this dusty survival strategy city builder was surprisingly brutal
description: Look, at this point I think my 20% survival rate in Homeseek was pretty good.

title: Diablo 4's first big patch is here, and it's almost entirely game balance tweaks
description: Barbarians, Rogues, and Sorcerers should now find it much easier to die

title: The AutoFull M6 gaming chair is one to look out for in 2023
description: Want to feel like a king when gaming? This chair could be your perfect throne.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #715: Sunday, June 4
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: I never get tired of Hitman: Blood Money's inventiveness
description: In this classic feature, Jim Rossignol took a long bath in Blood Money and declared it an excellent puzzle game as well as a stealth one.

title: Prepare for the strangest ride of your life in 1993's Hell Cab
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Watch a Thief fan film directed by one of the original game's creators
